Mr Michael Gove said the new national curriculum should embody for all children in England their cultural and scientific inheritance, enhance their understanding of the world around them and introduce them to the best that has been thought and written. The review panel has been asked to look at what subjects should be compulsory for pupils of different ages, as well as the content that should be taught in them. The government has

It is understood Mr Andy Coulson first informed the Prime Minister of his intention to leave last Wednesday before announcing his resigation two days later.
